pages.text: Pyrokinesis is an ability that ties into a gem's emotions. As a gem gets more emotional, they will light opponents on fire, and after having an outburst, sets a small area around them on fire! Be careful.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)Ruby$(br2) $(l)Gems that have a chance to have it$()$(li)Quartz$(li)Jasper$(li)Agate
